MyOs  0.0.0
MyOs based on Contiki-Os concepts for memory constrained microcontrollers.

48 #ifndef TIMESTAMP_H_
49 #define TIMESTAMP_H_
50 
51 #include "timestamp_arch.h"
52 
53 #define TIMESTAMP_TICKS_PER_SEC TIMESTAMP_ARCH_TICKS_PER_SEC
54 #define TIMESTAMP_DIFF TIMESTAMP_ARCH_DIFF
55 
56 typedef timestamp_arch_t timestamp_t;
57 typedef timestamp_t timespan_t;
58 
59 #define timestamp_module_init timestamp_arch_module_init
60 
61 #define timestamp_now timestamp_arch_now
62 
63 
64 #define timestamp_less_than(a,b) (TIMESTAMP_DIFF((a),(b)) < 0)
65 #define timestamp_lessequal_than(a,b) (TIMESTAMP_DIFF((a),(b)) <= 0)
66 
74 #define timestamp_passed(timestamp) \
75  timestamp_lessequal_than(timestamp,timestamp_now())
76 
77 
82 #define timestamp_block_until(timestamp) \
83  while(!timestamp_passed(timestamp)){};
84 
89 #define timestamp_block_for(timespan) \
90  do{ \
91  timestamp_t stop = timespan+timestamp_now(); \
92  timestamp_block_until(stop); \
93  }while(0)
94 
95 
96 
97 #endif /* TIMESTAMP_H_ */
